metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9028 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library) 1.5.13. There is a stack-based buffer over-read in the function InflateDimensions() in inflate.c when called from ReadNextCell in mat5.c.

criterions.comment: libmatio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
